text: Question 9 Suppose that in an IP-over-Ethernet network, a machine X wishes to find the MAC address of another machine Y in its subnet. Which one of the following techniques can be used for this? Xsends an ARP request packet to the local gateway's IP address which then finds the MAC address of Y and sends to X X'sends an ARP request packet to the local gateway's MAC address which then finds the MAC address of Y and sends to X X sends an ARP request packet with broadcast MAC address in its local subnet X sends an ARP request packet with broadcast IP address in its local subnet GATE CSE 2019 Computer Network
